1111010001011011 0010101101100011 0 -> sum: 0001111110111110, cout: 1

1000000001110110 1110100011001010 1 -> sum: 0110100101000001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
